I don't know if being next to a park on Friday and Saturday nights there will be an issue with the young people. Greetings and see you on the road.

title: (23689) - Camino Olivares

Un charmant village où vous pourrez profiter des couchers de soleil de la subbética Cordoue et de la sierra méridionale de Jaén. La tranquillité est l'atmosphère qui règne ici. Des itinéraires sont disponibles à proximité pour faire du vélo et de la marche. Idéal pour aller avec des enfants.

description: Exceptional and well maintained site

title: (14812) Almedinilla - 1E Paseo Moreras
description: Site to leave without problems and spend the night. It is next to a park in general you have everything and it is a town with a lot of history it is recommended to go to the tourist office and ask for information

title: (18249) Tózar - 2 Calle Nueva ag Tozar
description:
Level place/parking in rural village. Quiet to spent a night. Bakery comes in a van in the (late) morning (beeps).
Access very easy with any camper size. Other options also available around the village.
Free water tap with connector available on site, behind the building.

title: (14812) Almedinilla - Calle Media Era, 1
description: Quiet and quite flat street, next to a gym park and soccer field. Near the municipal pool, ideal in summer. Without services. Perfect to visit Almedinilla and close to shops and bars that serve you free tapas. Almedinilla is beautiful, with fountains, flower patios and pretty trails. Its Iberian settlement, the Roman villa and the waterfall of the horse jumping to Fuente Grande is a must visit. We have spent three days here and great. It is a quiet and safe town.

title: (18270) Montefrío - 12 Avenida Antonio Luis Soler

description: Good parking to visit the town

title: (23150) Valdepeñas de Jaén - Unnamed Road

title: (18247) Moclín - 71 Calle Real

title: (18247) Moclín - 5 Carretera de Tiena

title: (18248) Tiena - GR-3408

Area in Priego de Córdoba. 
Municipal free pitch with supply and disposal. The pitch is mostly very sloping. Quiet location next to a beautiful park. Shops and restaurants are located in the city center of 2 km. The area. There is no access in or out on Saturdays between 7am and 3pm due to market.

no service

title: (18220) Albolote - GR-300
description: Cubillas reservoir, a perfect place to be with a camper, the way to get there is somewhat narrow, however, with Ford transit we have entered well.

title: (18339) Chauchina - 20 Calle Acera Sol

title: (14880) Luque - CO-6204
description:
Parking actually for the excursion point
"Laguna del Salobral.
However, the lagoon has completely dried up. so it is rarely visited.
A very very quiet place.
In the midst of olive plantations.
No problems.

The place is right on the bike path
"Via Verde del Aceite"
This bike path is an open railway line. (olive oil train). In this area it runs through a very beautiful part of Andalusia. Over bridges and small gorges, almost flat.
Ideal for small bike tours.

title: () Albolote - GR-300
description: Just off the lakeside road, via a flattened railing. Small flat spot on the right with a nice view. Safe place to make a fire. Locals seem lucky enough. Lots of mountain bikers around.

title: (18370) Loreto -
description: Parking area for a quick stop. Parking mostly exposed to the sun, but if your minivan is not too high behind the restaurant there are also car parks with awnings!

title: (23600) Martos - 2F Calle Niño Jesús
description:
Large parking area with a long promenade with good views of the city and close to the old town so you can park and visit it on foot. There is also a recently built playground for the little ones. In winter it is usually quiet but in summer it is more crowded in the afternoons since people go up there to eat and hang out, taking advantage of the fact that due to its location there is usually a breeze and it is cooler than in the city. There are several food delivery establishments that have no problem delivering there, you just have to tell them that you are in the Paseo del Calvario parking lot. There is no sign restricting the use of motorhomes.

TO ACCESS YOU HAVE TO ENTER FROM THE HEALTH CENTER (C/Molino Medel) The other itineraries are too narrow

title: (14817) Priego de Córdoba - 86 Avenida Priego

It is located in the village of Las Lagunillas and there is a bar, bakery, supermarket, tobacconist, etc. nearby. Being about 20 meters from the road, vehicles can be heard but there is little traffic, since it is a secondary road that goes from Priego to Rute passing through villages. They fit 3 AC of 7.5m, the maneuver is easy and it is quite flat, in general very quiet. The townspeople / hamlet come by and say hello kindly.

title: (14811) Los Villares - 34 Diseminado los Villares
description: Camping- Cortijo Los Villares. Posada Niña Margarita. Motorhome and Camper area. Spectacular enclave for recreation and activities in the mountains. The owner offers accommodation at the Posada if you do not have a Camper or similar. There is also a bar service and meals. We only have 12 plots that give you an authentic family atmosphere and with a 100% guarantee of disconnection and relaxation. The 12 plots with access to electricity and 6 plots without electricity. In La Posada, which is 100 meters away, is the reception. There is a bar and very good internet connection. In spring and summer the Garden works and it is possible to buy totally organic vegetables or share a good time with the "Innkeeper"

title_short: (18320) Santa Fe - 6135 Calle Avenida de América

name: Camping Granada
title: (18210) Camping Granada
description:
Small and family campsite. The plots are very good, both those without electricity (for people who do not need it) and those with electricity. The campsite people are very nice. The plots are large and sunny. Caravans cannot exceed 5.00 meters and motorhomes 7.00. It is located 11 km from Granada. Some plots have very good views of Sierra Nevada and Granada. Everything is very clean and the price is right. There is a lot of calm
Extra fee for electricity.

title: (18310) Salar - A-4155
description: Gas station on a country road with gray and black water drain and drinking water hose. Next to it is a camper pitch on flat, somewhat dusty ground. A sign explicitly allows camping for 24 hours. There is space for at least two WoMos. Picnic tables are also part of the complimentary service.

title_short: (23650) Torredonjimeno - 29 Avenida de la Vía Verde

title: (23194) Jaén - 51 Diseminado Ctra Valdepeñas
description: Picnic area next to the road, quiet although with the noise of some cars, frequented by people walking. Perfect for visiting Jaén, with a bike path to the city, you can go for a walk although without lighting. Nearby climbing routes.

title: (18220) - 54D Urbanizacion Suelo Urbnzble. Si
description:
Spacious parking lot next to the tram stop, very quiet.
Unguarded, unsecured.

description: Street near the school, ideal for sleeping outside school hours.

title: (18210) Peligros - Av. Reina Sofía
description: Drinking water source

title: (23650) Torredonjimeno - 1 Avenida del Parque
description: Quiet parking, next to a playground. Overnight is allowed. Without services but with public toilets.

title: (14870) Zuheros - CV-247
description: On the edge of the road, but with little passage, except some cars, mountain biking, hiker and shepherd, visit the cave or walk, CC good, no service.

title: (14870) Zuheros - CV-247
description: Parking in earth of the cave and eco museum. A bit of slope but very quiet and superb view. Possibility to visit the cave. No service. Beautiful village of Zueros 4 km.

title: (18210) Peligros - 5 Merida
description: Large area to stop and rest very quiet and safe area and at night. It is next to the municipal sports center, there is usually no problem with the police, very large parking and easy entry

title: (18210) Peligros - 69 Diseminado Extrarradio
description: Quiet area to spend the night and rest there is always parking and you sleep quite well. Next door there is a school that enters from 09:00 to 14:00. There is usually no problem with the police. is considered free public parking

name: Finca Bellavista
title: (18200) Finca Bellavista
description:
Quiet and safe place, with 24-hour personalized attention, video surveillance cameras, closed area, with all services, showers, toilet, sink, washing machine, dryer, free Wi-Fi, rest area, large plots to put out awnings, chairs and tables.
Bus stop 200 meters away, tram stop 500 meters away (for 33 cents) directly to the center of Granada, taxi service, bakery service at 9 in the morning, supermarket 500 meters away, with bike path, with views of Sierra Nevada, near the A92 highway, entrance via GR30, exit 5.

title: (23002) Jaén - 2 Calle Dean de la Fuente González
title_short: (23002) Jaén - 2 Calle Dean de la Fuente González
description: Slightly sloping parking, ample parking. Quiet at night, in summer more crowded. 20 minutes walk to the city center. Nice views.

address.street: 2 Calle Dean de la Fuente González

title: (18211) Cogollos de la Vega - 16 GR-3424
description: Parking next to the road behind an institute and away from the town, the area is very quiet, and there is practically no traffic because the road ends later, about 300 meters away there are garbage containers and a bar-restaurant called Catacena, highly recommended for eating, about 100 m from the bar, there is a spring water source, reached by a path that is attached to the fence of the institute, highly recommended to spend a quiet night.

title: (18310) Salar - 211 Barrio Sau
description: Quiet place where you can sleep, fits a long motorhome.

title: (23650) Torredonjimeno - JV-2121
description: Beautiful place where you can spend the night and enjoy nature and its centenary olive trees, very spacious, 100 meters from a beautiful hermitage of Our Lady of Consolation (14th century), and 2 kilometers from the town of Torredonjimeno.

title: (18200) Maracena - 1 Avenida Ernesto Che Guevara
description: Very nice and green place to rest. Quiet area

title: (23191) Jaén - Carretera Bailén-Motril
description: CEPSA El Oasis service station. It has large parking for trucks and cars with 5 water intakes.

title: (14870) Zuheros - 60 Calle Santo
description: Parking at the entrance of the village, dawn and very quiet. Nice place

title: (18210) Peligros - 1 Carretera Bailen
description: A gas station on the edge of the motorway. It has washing facilities for mobile homes (up to 2.6m high, self-service, high-pressure cleaner), and water (the compressed air for the tires also has a tap with a hose for water, which is actually intended to refill the windshield wipers, but I have my tank with it also filled and it was no problem)

title: (14870) Zuheros - 125 Poligono PP-R1
description: Cemetery parking, good place to visit Zuheros, and possibility of spending the night, although it is next to the road, it is not very busy

description: Drinking water in pressure tap, difficult to connect with a hose but good for filling a jerry can.

title: (14870) Zuheros - 305 Poligono PP-R1

title_short: (23002) Jaén - 30-32 Calle Cerro de San Cristóbal
description: Quiet, parking area where you can spend the night, it is near the historic city of Jaen. We recommend visiting the cathedral.

title: () La Guardia de Jaén - Unnamed Road
title_short: () La Guardia de Jaén - Unnamed Road
description: Recreational area with a great experience. Nice and quiet at sunset. Paved access but very steep road. Still accessible to Ac.

title: (23004) Jaén - 1 Carretera al Neveral

title: (23004) Jaén - 2 Explanada Cañoquebrado

title: (18200) Maracena - 1 Plaza Jose Antonio Atienza
description:
Parking next to the municipal pool, with a super cheap restaurant that eats great, it's called EMAUS catering restaurant, we parked to come to the pool and spend the afternoon since it was too hot, it's great, super friendly people.
swimming pool with bathrooms, showers, etc.

title: (14859) Albendín - 26 Calle Noria
description: A new area with gray water and black water emptying point and clean water filling point very very cozy quiet town

title: (23004) Jaén - 30 Carretera al Parador
description: Very quiet place, hardly any traffic, shade and good views of Jaén, on the weekend I imagine from the remains of MC that I see, it must be more crowded

title: (18300) Loja - 15 Avenida de la Paz
description: Quiet place to spend the day, next to the Mercadona

title: (18561) Montejícar - Unnamed Road
description: To spend the night, very quiet.

title: (18214) Nívar -
description: Public parking in the village of nivar

title: (18300) Loja - 21 Avenida Alcaudique
description: Quiet field next to the cemetery

title: (18300) Loja - 19 Avenida Fernando de los Rios
title_short: (18300) Loja - 19 Avenida Fernando de los Rios
description: Facing the football field at the end of the road. Nice we could let go of the dog. It was a Friday training until 9:30 pm without genes.

title: (18197) Pulianas - 38 Urbanizacion Suelo Urbanizable Ind
description: Quiet parking directly behind the Aki DIY store. The car park is located behind a shopping center (Parque Granaita) with many shops and restaurants.

title: (18300) Loja - 44 Calle Rafael Pérez del Álamo
title_short: (18300) Loja - 44 Calle Rafael Pérez del Álamo
description: Parking at the fairgrounds, go towards the roundabout and turn right before the last house on the right, where it says C/Cádiz on the map. Very quiet place to spend the night.

title: (23640) Torre del Campo - CR N-321, 63,4
description: Repsol gas station with shower. When we went it was very clean and new.

title: (18300) Loja - 3 Camino Molinillos
description: Disposal inside the village of Loja, very quiet place to spend the night with many bars and shops nearby.

title: (18300) Loja - C. Carmen de los Angeles
title_short: (18300) Loja - C. Carmen de los Angeles
description:
Large flat field with a lot of space, it is 3 min walk from the center and with various services such as laundry at 100 MTR, several bakeries, pastry shops also at 100 MTR.
edit ....is now a tarmac car park
take first right out of carpark and along near the cafes ....other routes out roads are too small .check first because is a long way to reverse !

title: (18014) Granada - 575 Carretera de Córdoba
description: 24-hour service station, car wash, cafeteria

title: (18300) Loja - 3 Calle Loja Ecuador
description: Very quiet and shady place next to the hospital

title: (18300) Loja - 3 Calle Fez
description: Municipal area of recent creation, so much so that it is not signposted yet. Free water filling and emptying services. Very spacious squares next to the municipal pavilion and the hospital, near the cinema and the center and restaurant areas.

title: () Loja - CP-74
description: Several spots at side of very quiet rural gravel road on a firm mostly level grassy verge with beautiful views of valley below. Not a single car passed us by on a Friday night. We think there are only 3 or 4 houses further down the road so very quiet indeed.

title: (18300) Loja - 24 Calle Rafael Pérez del Álamo
title_short: (18300) Loja - 24 Calle Rafael Pérez del Álamo
description: Parking next to the municipal pavilion of Loja. Right next to the pantry restaurant where asking for a drink you get very good tapas for free and right next to it is the bonachera bakery where you can buy bread and sweets typical of Loja such as their donuts or cinnamon buns.

title: (18197) Andalusia - 4S Urbanizacion Ppi 03
description: Pitches on the edge of a quiet dead end street with little traffic. Next door a large shopping area.

title: (18014) Granada - S.N Avenida de Andalucía
description: Free air water point

title: (18197) Granada - 6 Calle Luis Buñuel
description: Parkin Mall. Mercadona, Declathon ... ideal before climbing to Sierra Nevada. Self-service laundry located inside the car park.

title: (23005) Jaén - 1 Diseminado Ctra Cordoba
description: Natural area. Difficult access for Ac. Climbing area "4 peaks"

title: (18197) Pulianas - s/n Calle Boulevard Billy Wilder
title_short: (18197) Pulianas - s/n Calle Boulevard Billy Wilder
description: Big parking lot at a shopping center. Only during the day.

title: (23003) Jaén - 30 Avenida Granada
description: Parking near the center of Jaen. It does not have its own services, but it is next to a petrol station with a supermarket and toilet

title: (23005) Jaén - Calle Hospital de San Lazaro
title_short: (23005) Jaén - Calle Hospital de San Lazaro
description: Parking with some unevenness

title: (23003) Jaén - 44 Avenida Granada
description: Large parking lot of the city of Jaen feria, next to the local police. Without convenience but 1km from the cathedral, basilica and city center, beautiful views of the surroundings and apparently quiet. Very accessible even to the big truck or with trailer, we are there for Holy Week, a good compromise with the overbuilt parking close to the historic center. Can be closed during events or feria

title: (18014) Granada - 162 Avenida de Maracena
description: Drinking fountain. You can park next to it if there is room, it is right next to a school

title: (18014) Granada - Avenida Federico García Lorca
description: This set of car parks along a low traffic lane is located in a new area of buildings under construction. Calm day and night, there are plenty of places nearby, allowing you to get to the city center of Granada by the nearby tram in about twenty minutes. The visit to the Alhambra took us 5 hours ( possibility to take the tickets on the spot without prior reservation in low season and early - an identity document is necessary for the entrance). We spent 2 nights there safely. Very good compromise to visit the city.

title: (18197) Pulianillas - 1 Avenida Huerta de San Anton
title_short: (18197) Pulianillas - 1 Avenida Huerta de San Anton
description: Simple gravel parking lot near the 'downtown'. Busy in the afternoon, but quiet at night.

title: (18567) Domingo Pérez - Cam. Casa Nueva
description: Small shady spot (in the middle of the day) near a spring, with a bench for a picnic. Very quiet place below a hamlet. Please keep it clean: there is even a trash can, so there is no excuse for leaving your small papers and other waste on the floor!

title: (18014) Granada - 371 Calle Periodista Luis Seco de Lucena
title_short: (18014) Granada - 371 Calle Periodista Luis Seco de Lucena
description: Quiet neighborhood behind school sports center. Near metro stop to downtown

address.street: 371 Calle Periodista Luis Seco de Lucena

title: (18014) Granada - 103 Barrio PP-N3 Borde Norte
description: Ample and easy parking along the roads, near the motorway exit, with views of the Sierra Nevada, quiet area as it is new construction, next to a park with a water source. Tram 300 m away (JAEN stop) direction Armilla. To visit the Alhambra, get off at the "Recogidas" stop and from there walk about 2.2 km to the Alhambra, or take a taxi/Alhambra bus. It would certainly be possible to stay overnight as there were no prohibition signs, but it was certainly a bit noisy due to the cars driving past.

title: (18014) Granada - 116D Avenida de Maracena
description: 50m from the tram, ideal for visiting Granada . Quiet night. No service. Spacious seats for large motorhomes. What more.

title: (18300) Loja - 1 Cuesta del Socorro
description: Picnic area on the side of the road with drinking water and 2 tables. No shade. There are only 2 parking plces for 2 small cars or 1 camper

title: (23170) La Guardia de Jaén - Paseo de Andalucía
title_short: (23170) La Guardia de Jaén - Paseo de Andalucía
description: Free parking, level, with free services and nice views.

title: (18013) Granada - 6 Calle Casería Aguirre
description: Newly paved parking. At night with light. Spacious. 3 days without problem

title: (18014) Granada - 7 Calle la Calera
description: Parked on condition.. safe and quiet

title: (18014) Granada - 2 Calle Calicasas
description: We stayed in this area encouraged by other colleagues. Quiet nights and hardly any people. The only noise is that of the tram that passes until 12 at night and early. Very close to the JAEN Metro stop that leaves you in the same Center. Nearby there is an Aldi and several restaurants. We slept 3 nights with no problem.

title: (23006) Jaén - s/n Calle Fuente del Serbo
title_short: (23006) Jaén - s/n Calle Fuente del Serbo
description: Open parking, without a barrier, asphalt, flat, from a Lidl supermarket, easy access for large ACs. Opposite is a large playground and a Burger King. You can take a walk to the center and visit the city. There are no services.

title: (18300) Loja - 84 Arco de Plines
description: Drinking water

title: (18015) Granada - 138 Carretera de Málaga
description: LPG ... REFILL.

title: (18195) Cúllar Vega - 150 Camino de las Galeras
title_short: (18195) Cúllar Vega - 150 Camino de las Galeras
description: Good place to visit the fertile plain of Granada. The lung of Granada! there are many flat paths to walk between the fields of tobacco or corn, pastry / bakery at 1 km open from Monday to Sunday on the street of La Vega 144. The bakery La Espiga. fresh bread. very recommendable shaded place, cafe at 200m

title: (18013) Granada - nº 104 Avenida de Juan Pablo II
title_short: (18013) Granada - nº 104 Avenida de Juan Pablo II
description: Wasteland ! Had a quiet night...nearby tram or bike ride to Granada center.

address.street: nº 104 Avenida de Juan Pablo II

title: (18014) Granada - 3P Avenida Federico García Lorca
description: Secure overnight parking. Next to sports pavilion, with several restaurants around

title: (18014) Granada - 26 Calle Isla de la Gomera
title_short: (18014) Granada - 26 Calle Isla de la Gomera
description: The parking is very quiet and secure. Next to the police station. Close to the bus station.

title: (18300) Loja - Unnamed Road
description: Parking area with tables and barbecue. I guess if you stay overnight, no one will tell you anything.

title: (23006) Jaén - 9 Calle San Francisco Javier
description: Perfect and quiet to spend the night, the center is 15 minutes walk and the price is worth it because although it has no services it is guarded. It is ADIF parking.

title: (18014) Granada - 10 Calle Torres
description: Parking in quiet residential area. Very spacious and far from buildings, next to a park with swings. Good for spending the night and parking during the day. Some car noises, but not too annoying.

title: (18013) Granada - 4 Calle Casería del Cerro
description: Flat free large completely empty car park. 30 min walk from town. Quietish.

title: (18102) Purchil - 63 Calle Granada
description: Great place to park and spend the night. Very quiet town with bars and supermarkets. Ideal for visiting the city since it is very close and there is a bike lane to be able to walk .
